Module Yahoo::ControllerMethods
In: lib/yahoo_bbauth/controller_methods.rb

Methods

authorizes_through_yahoo  

Public Instance methods

authorizes_through_yahoo(options = {})

Calling this method in your desired controller will automatically create a #login action in that controller which will redirect the user to Yahoo’s authentication page for your registered application.

Configure the behavior of the plugin as follows:

:action_name:overrides login as the name of the action automatically created in your controller
:params:a Hash of parameters like {:send_userhash => 1, :appdata => ‘someFlag’} sent with your login request

[Validate]
